comments.body: In the description, we need to also document the metadata are removed by this rule.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@ * column reference points to a column in the right side plan of a self-join, users will get
 * unexpected result because the column reference can't match the newly generated
 * [[AttributeReference]].
 *
 * Note that, this rule removes all the Dataset id related metadata from `AttributeReference`, so
